Text: Omi adago oj ide-mi,
Taku Jihofa dohi ñw mi kakini:
Todu ane̩ kʼe̩ go le̩ chʼutod iko-wñ ki che̩date̩ ta;
Go, onugo-wñ chʼe̩wu te̩, i chʼo̩kpakpa ef uwñ n,
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, omi achiwebe̩te̩ma adʼo̩wo̩ tʼef ukpo aro̩kpo̩; e̩ne̩ ki ake ado̩mo̩ gbane̩ n.
Abo-i du akpʼita rʼo̩ oji n? ku ma achʼo uke̩ kakini,
Ame̩no̩me̩-we̩ akwane̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la achigili n?
Todabu kʼuwe̩ kʼane̩ abo uche̩ichi wewe,
Atogwo ki chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi ajʼile e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw abunyi-wñ,
Uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ñwa nyʼunyi-we̩
Todu okuta kʼi dʼo̩la o̩do̩ akwa,
Atogwo chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼe̩bie̩ akʼunyi,
Go, i che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du
Todu ile̩-i ako̩ ñw ojima Jihofa ema,
Atogwo chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼe̩wñ ñw ekeji-wñ ñmo̩
Anyo̩ akʼuwe̩ efu koji ojima.
Todu e̩wñ afuma ku ma che Le̩bano̩n abʼe̩ ma;
Ugbo chʼile ojibo ku ma gbe̩
Atogwo ki chʼe-e̩ne̩ ki aka ñw oli kakini, Mʼolu ji;
Jihofa muda dʼef unyi-wñ kiafo̩;
